Pfft. Noob. 

Wait until I bust out the _really_ weird shit. Like the manga where two orphan children fall in love while working in the sewers, but one of them ends up turning into a parasite and becoming addicted to their partner's shit. 

I remember I found it on a hentai website where it was labeled "weird". In hindsight, not a good sign _for a hentai website_.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ac400b6368720984000ddd#post_55ac400b6368720984000ddd
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ac3d7b636872087800046e#post_55ac3d7b636872087800046e
Is your family always this.... crappy?
I feel quite sorry for you.[/bq]
Pretty much.

I don't have a lot of money but what money I do have I put towards footing how much I cost, I only use about $200 a month in bills and I've been giving that on average but my uncle doesn't work, doesn't go to school, his daughter is gone most of the time and he pays for her to go to camps and that so she's home even less and yet I'm the one "leaching off people".


It may be a mean thing of me to say this: I'm laughing at how since my family is so horrible legitimately nobody wants to be around them and their families are broken.


My brother is such a horrible person that he can't hold relationships cause nobody sane wants to get in his pants.  His "wife" is just his ex that he hates and she hates him, but nobody else can stand to be around them.

My sister is such a horrible parent that she literally has had to give away two out of three of her kids to her exes cause she does not know how to handle children.
